creditline: Gift of Louise J. Drews in memory of her parents Margaret and Carson Jamieson
description: covered jar, ceramic, scene of a lady bathing in black and gold on white ground, Chinese Export XVIIIc (82.110.12ab)
medium: Porcelain with enamel and gilded decoration
text: The subject of a lady at her toilet was a popular one on export porcelain.
title: Covered jar
